name: Automatically assign Facebook Leads by location via Salesforce
description: Automate the allocation of new Facebook leads to your sales reps with precision. Our Salesforce-based solution identifies the sales rep for each lead's location and instantly dispatches an email, ensuring a timely and personalized follow-up. Perfect for setups with a dedicated sales rep per region, this template simplifies lead distribution, accelerates response times, and aims to increase conversion rates.
